lyrics:
104 contributorstranslationstiếng việtfrançaisportuguêsheart attack lyricsintro
puttin my defenses up
cause i dont wanna fall in love
if i ever did that i think id have a heart attack

verse 1

never had trouble getting what i want
but when it comes to you im never good enough
when i dont care
i can play em like a ken doll
wont wash my hair

but you make me wanna act like a girl
paint my nails and wear high heels yes you
make me so nervous that i just cant hold your hand

chorus

but i cover up wont let it show
so im putting my defenses up up
cause i dont wanna fall in love love
if i ever did that i think id have a heart attack
i think id have a heart attack
i think id have a heart attack
you might also likeverse 2
